name: The Curse Of Esrevni
description:
The Curse Of Esrevni is a 2-4 player multiplayer board game. The aim of the game is to survive by getting rid of various obstacles and traps. In the meantime, you can set various traps on your opponents. Anything can happen, be careful! Don't give up !


Features

Ascending level game system
Trap setting
Attack the opponent
Skill cards
Lucky cards
Freecam
developers: IMMAGINERS YAZILIM DONANIM TEKNOLOJILERI SANAYI VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: IMMAGINERS YAZILIM DONANIM TEKNOLOJILERI SANAYI VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
